modName: Breezehome cellar no loadingscreen basement Keller
summary:
New version 1.96! A basement for your Breezehome. Enter it without loading time! All crafting supplies and much more storage places. Some improvements to Breezehome and Lydia. 
German, English, Polish! Use String Maker for other languages or comment and I will do it!
descriptionHtml:
New version 1.96
Lydia can enter and leave the basement again (problem was default ladder, since not scaling one).

- For realism -
I changed all (three) barrels to storage barrels with respawn timer. My thought is, that it simulates the freshnesh of food and after a time the food is rotten (deleted).
This characteristics have also the sacks.

All your items in the other storages should be save and updates of my mod should work without problems.

Please comment and make sugestions or say your wishes!

German:
Ein Keller f√ºr euer verbessertes Brisenheim!

The cellar is only usable after you paid for the original alchemy room! Before you paid for it, Breezehome will looks original!

Included:
- weapon and shield racks
- bookshelves
- chests
- all crafting things

Gimmicks:
- in whole Breezehome more realistic lightning
- in whole Breezehome better navmesh
- my own ladder-fix no stumble anymore
- special weapon/shield racks
- for realism: a grate over the smithing and two tubes at the smelter
- a decorative training place for bow aiming
- a special displaycase for especially soulgems
- you cannot jump on the fire of the smithing
- hidden safe near the basement ladder
- a new bed for your dovahkiin
- Lydia sleeps in her new bed in her room
- Lydia walks in whole Breezehome and can uses all crafting things
- Lydia wears if not following you normal clothes and has no visible weapon.
- Lydias old armor/weapons are in her inventory.
- Lydia moves a little bit faster.
- Lydia can die so give her heal potions and be aware of her.
  (Heal Other Mod http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=509 and
  Grand Healing Mod http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=426 may help you!)
- Lydia start with some heal potions in her inventory.
- soft dusty effect

Not included:
- mannequins, because of this fantastic mod: Advanced Mannequins http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8635

I\'m german, please forgive not accurate english.

~ Sorry, for all the updates because of problems. I started working with the CK direct with this basement! ~

Optional:
- for realism changed decorate alchemy laboratory for 500 gold to building basment for 3500 gold (enable outside from Dragonsreach)

Changelog

V. 1.7:
- For realism -
I changed the other two static barrels also to storage barrels with respawn timer. This characteristics have also the sacks.

V. 1.8:
Important, I changed the barrel in the living room, so this items could be deleted! (my foods in the sacks aren\'t deleted, the barrel I didn\'t checked) And the items you put in it will be deleted after time. (If you miss an item than use the console; search with google) To understand the thought of this, please read further.

- Fixed! -
Noticed that bookshelves can less books store than normal, will fix it so that you will not loose the placed books! I tested it out, I can delete the old \"bookshelves\", you have to take the books and then you can put them back to the shelf.
- Fixed! -

- Fixed! -
Find out that the CTDs at leaving Breezehome comes from corrupted bookshelves. Fact is it is not possible to leave Breezehome after put nine books in the upper bookshelf next to the fire (cooking place) eight ok, nine not!
- Fixed! -

- Fixed! -
Noticed that the weapon shelves are corrupted!
- Fixed! -

New version 1.92! (Polish integrated)
Please take all weapons and shields from the racks before enabling 1.92! 

New version 1.93! Lydia fixed she uses whole Breezehome again.

1.94 (all compatible to 1.93):
~ Improved Lydia ~
Lydia wears if not following you normal clothes and has no visible weapon.
Lydias old armor/weapons are in her inventory.
Lydia moves a little bit faster.
Lydia can die so give her heal potions and be aware of her.
(Heal Other Mod http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=509 and
 Grand Healing Mod http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=426 may help you!)
Lydia start with some heal potions in her inventory.

1.95
- Crate next to forge has a real bottom.
- Basement ladder is not scaled anymore. (better for 3rd person perspective and Lydia)
- Changed a little the lights.
- Lydia is a little still faster.

I\'m using the Real Effect Candle mod in softer version 1.0.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7643

FAQ:
\"I would like to know if this mod eliminates any of the existing storage in Breezehome.\"
It eliminates no existing storage. Only add some more.

My other mod:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13584]Realistic Backpack - Rucksack[/url]

Hint:
Because of the system how skyrim manage scripts in savegames.
This mod has no new scripts, only the original ones!
author: fruitgnome

files.name: breezehome cellar
files.changelogHtml: Lydia can enter and leave the basement again.
